thread.title: Exclusive: Wal-Mart launches new front in U.S. price war, targets Aldi in grocery aisle
thread.title_full: Exclusive: Wal-Mart launches new front in U.S. price war, targets Aldi in grocery aisle

author: Pollyanna
title: Exclusive: Wal-Mart launches new front in U.S. price war, targets Aldi in grocery aisle
text:
Exclusive: Wal-Mart launches new front in U.S. price war, targets Aldi in grocery aisle 
(Reuters) â€“ Wal-Mart Stores Inc is running a new price-comparison test in at least 1,200 U.S. stores and squeezing packaged goods suppliers in a bid to close a pricing gap with German-based discount grocery chain Aldi and other U.S. rivals like Kroger Co , according to four sources familiar with the moves.
